programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Patisserie pandemonium ensues as the bakers make cream horns, glass domes and showstopping macarons. Wholl go through to the final? And whose glass dome sees them going home?

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a couple turning a water pumping station into a luxury holiday home and an outdoor swimmer building a futurist micro camper. Plus: a glamping pod in a Danish forest.

programme.title: Jamies One-Pan Wonders
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver shows us how to make a super-fast, flavoursome smoky noodle soup, the cleverest home-made bread and a chicken and mushroom pie with a time-saving tip for perfect pastry.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day one of a brand new competition. In Lincolnshire, Carrie Bradshaw-wannabe Jose Stewart is hosting a `Sex and the City meets Marbella night for her guests. Jose struggles to tear herself away from Twitter to concentrate on cooking her Spanish-themed menu. Later she introduces a game of truth or dare with some interesting revelations, and even an unlikely romantic encounter.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Day two in Lincolnshire sees history teacher Skip Shultz plan an evening celebrating his American roots, but while the guests are impressed with the starter, the main proves a confusing flop. Will Skips entertainment save the day, and what secret does he have to reveal?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Lincolnshire its Sharon Wrights turn to hose. Shes repeatedly practised her key dishes of seared scallops, crispy top pork belly, and chocolate praline tart, hoping to impress her guests with three perfectly cooked courses. Sharon has a strict schedule, but her guests want to see her put the businesswoman to one side and have a good time.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day four in Lincolnshire, and tattoo artist Indy Nijjar is hosting a summer-themed dinner party, but what do his guests make of the "bring swimwear" dress code? School teacher Skip Shultz is feeling nervous. In a final bid for the prize, Indy decides to serve his dessert somewhere a little bit different. Will it be enough to impress his guests and bag him a high score?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final day of the competition in Lincolnshire and the turn of ditzy but endearing 23-year-old Jessica Carroll. Over the course of the week Jessica has shown a suspicious lack of food knowledge: asking American contestant Skip Schultz if there was pumpkin in his pumpkin pie, and revealing that she thought her scallops were chicken. Does her Chinese dinner and unusual house pet impress her guests?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the first day of the competition in Worcestershire and fitness enthusiast Claire Wier is producing a low-fat menu for her guests, Tim, Teresa, Chris, and Pippa. Claire remains confident and oblivious all evening, despite her guests moaning about the lack of cream, fat, oil and butter in her meal. As if healthy eating wasnt enough, Claire has her guests working up their appetite with an aerobic workout.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On day two of the competition in Worcestershire beauty pageant queen and dinner party virgin Pippa Langhorne throws a sophisticated `Midsummer Nights Dream evening for her guests. Pippas fishy starter doesnt get a great response from shellfish-hater Claire or oddball Tim, who claims fish are his friends. The main goes down well with foodie Teresa, who thinks it very flavoursome, but not so well with moaner Chris.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day three in Worcestershire and party boy publican Tim Lawson is hoping to win over his guests with a raucous country-themed blow-out. Hes hoping his wild night will be enough to take the lead ahead of calorie counter Claire Wier and wannabe opera star Pippa Langhorne. Will Tims novel take on a prawn cocktail be enough to impress?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On day four in Worcestershire, Teresa Cox is hoping to win over her guests with a rich, sumptuous feast. Will they appreciate the fine food, especially fitness enthusiast Claire Wier, who will probably faint at the amount of cream Teresa is planning to use? With the group feeling jaded after a wild night at publican Tim Lawsons dinner party, what will serial moaner Chris Sheppard make of Teresas efforts?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Chris Sheppard throws a sophisticated black-tie-themed evening for his guests. Hes got a job on his hands to bring harmony back to the group after Pippa stormed out of Teresas party when Tim had the audacity to claim that her pet dog couldnt speak French. Chriss starter goes down a treat, with everyone agreeing his home-made sweet chilli sauce is the best theyve ever tried.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Craig Rowe helps Andy and Vicky find their dream holiday home on Crete, to enjoy the Greek way of life. With a budget of £90k, can they find somewhere they love enough to make an offer?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lisa and Neil have holidayed on Menorca for decades. They love the lifestyle, scenery and climate and want to buy their own holiday home there. Jasmine Harman shows them what £250k can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton jets off to help Sally and her husband Tony, who fell in love with Cyprus 15 years ago. Now, with their children all grown up, they want to buy their holiday home. Laura Hamilton shows them five options for Sallys budget of £125,000.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Retired teachers Gloria and Russell look for their dream holiday home in vibrant Valencia. Can Jasmine Harman get in their good books with five great options for their £115k?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Sarah Millican: Chatterbox Live

programme.title: Doctor Who Confidential
programme.desc: Cameras follow the team as they travel the length and breadth of the UK to launch the new series, getting up close and personal with Matt Smith and Karen Gillan as they journey from Belfast to London, taking in emotional whistle-stop visits to their home towns along the way. Plus, theres a look at the creation of the stunning underground city.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor battles to prevent an all out war between the Silurians and the humans. But a potential apocalypse looms.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Stacey and Gavin return from honeymoon to a big welcome from both families. However, Smithy seems none too happy with his best mate and Nessa has a confession to make that throws the whole evening into disarray.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Devastated by the news hes to become a father, Smithy goes AWOL. The boys finally track him down, but can he be persuaded to do the right thing? Stacey is shocked to hear of Gwens new domestic arrangements as the prospect of living in Essex finally hits her.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma receives dodgy life advice from her incarcerated sister Catherine and Rita, her alcoholic boss. Worried that she will be having the baby alone, Gemma enlists Cherry to help her find a suitable, ideally rich, father for her unborn child. Meanwhile, Malcolm thinks he has found love with a woman online. Gemma educates him on the perils of catfishing - but Derek encourages Malcolm to meet her.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma attends birthing classes led by a very eccentric antenatal teacher. Realising she needs more support, she seeks advice from her aunt Jess, Malcolms sister. She and Malcolm get invited to Jess and her domineering husband Tyrones new house for a party, but Malcolm is scared of Tyrone, who intimidates him with his new hot tub.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPauls search for the UKs Next Drag Race Superstar continues.Its Rusical week! The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge, RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel as the curtain comes down on yet another queen. Which queen will be the Tinker Bell of the ball, and who will sashay away from a happy ending?

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Fresh new talent aim to impress famous faces and follow in the footsteps of some of stand-ups biggest names. Across a number of rounds, comedians compete to show they could be the next breakout comedy star.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Birminghams Hockley Social Club has been transformed into our very own comedy club. Taking to the stage are Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh in a bid to impress our judges and book their place in the final. Award-winning comedian and writer Sarah Keyworth is here to keep the house in order. The judges are comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri completes the trio.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: The BBCs big comedy talent search, the New Comedy Awards is scouring the country to uncover the hottest new stand-ups. Ee head to the capital and the historic Alexandra Palace, home of the BBCs first broadcast. Five comics will battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown, where one will be crowned the BBC New Comedian of 2025. Hosting the comedy extravaganza is comedian, actor, presenter and writer Sara Pascoe.

programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Felix the pig is stuck on a cliff ledge where not even Mojos tops can reach him. Theyll need to be creative to get Bo up there and save that poor pig!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Dad drops an essential gizmo in a hard-to-reach place. Big Lizard takes them on an underwater adventure to meet Ammon, the tentacled solution to their problem!

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: Twinkle is unhappy with how easy questing has become since Cral the Eagle joined the heroes, offending the eagle just when they need him the most.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organise a dance contest, and the first prize is a jar of Yummy. Grizzy decides to participate as hes already hungry.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilised in amber resin that resembles him. Grizzy hopes to take the block of amber with him, but the Lemmings fight him for it.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.desc: Dot creates a plan for her Tera training aptitude test against Iono - but will it work?

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: Max and Harvey host the Queasy Spa quiz, where the Bros face some nauseating treatments! And can they pilot their own water jet packs in the Ultimate Memory Test?

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Nitro pranks Apollo with fake influencer Aubry Devonne Keep, causing a big splash! And the other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes, pranking the audience at the Arena.

programme.title: Blue Peter
programme.desc: Its our spookiest special yet, as were in a creepy castle for Halloween!

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Its an exciting week at Longmeadow as Monty makes a start on his new woodland garden. Advolly Richmond looks at the history of Gertrude Jekyll, and Carol Klein revels in the displays at RHS Rosemoor.

programme.title: Scott of the Antarctic
programme.desc: A faithful representation of the doomed Antarctic expedition of 1911-12 led by Captain Robert Falcon Scott. After much misfortune, the five-man team makes it to the South Pole through almost superhuman effort - only to find that the Norwegian flag is already flying. They then set out on the perilous return journey, but more disasters befall them.

programme.title: Kelvins Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: Kelvin and Liz must make their toughest decision so far: deciding the fate of one of their male lambs. Having been castrated, he is of no use to them for breeding, so Kelvin wonders whether it is time to take his first trip to the slaughterhouse.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Bakeation
programme.desc: After nearly five thousand miles, the Hairy Bikers reach the last leg of their Bake-ation which takes them through northern Spain. Their journey starts in San Sebastian where they get stuck in to the local cuisine with pinchos; tapas gone large! They also learn the secret properties of spelt, Europes forgotten grain and use it to bake not only bread but a giant spelt sausage roll, packed with chorizo.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: Ricks idea of bliss is to spend an afternoon scaling and gutting a freshly caught sea bass before using it to make a simple yet delectable dish which ranks amongst his absolute favourites - steamed sea bass with garlic, ginger and spring onions.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel pairs spice with contrasting cooling flavours as he makes a chicken and chilli curry, spiced rice pudding and hot and spicy prawns.

programme.title: Alison Hammonds Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan feast on chicken and biscuits at a legendary Orlando diner, check out the heroic hustle at a fire station, and end the day with a sleepover in a haunted hotel.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: In the Highlands, Raymond tests the market for valais blacknose crossbreeds at the Thainstone Rare Breed Sale, while his kids put pressure on him to buy more pets. Crofters Lynn and Sandra are thrown in the deep end when they try to buy stock at auction for the first time. Dairy farmers the McLeans bring in a bovine fertility expert to check on their cows pregnancies. Later the family pulls together to tidy up the farm for an upcoming Red Tractor inspection.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: From a bleak childhood, Jane Eyre becomes a governess for the cruel, dark and abrupt master of the house, Mr Rochester. In her new position at Thornfield House, Jane finds herself being drawn ever closer to her employer and soon finds herself falling in love with him. However, could Mr Rochesters secret destroy this transcendental love?

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin and the team are in the Welsh town of Monmouth. Charlie Ross takes a trip down memory lane when he values some Babar books.

programme.title: Match of the Day LIVE
programme.sub-title: FA Cup, First Round: Brackley Town v Notts County
programme.desc: Brackley Town take on Notts County in the first round of the FA Cup.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotlands Rivers
programme.desc: Paul Murton explores the River Garry. He hears tales of the clan chief Struan Robertson who fought in all three Jacobite risings, then discovers the geology of deep time, before restaging the Battle of Killiecrankie with just two men, a musket, and a broadsword. After surviving a highland charge, Paul falls off a bridge. Journeys end is on the beautiful Ben Vrackie, the `speckled hill.

programme.title: TOTP 2
programme.desc: From the pop-soul vocal groups and all-female rock and roll bands of the 60s, to the 90s ladettes with attitude and doll domination of the noughties - welcome to womans hour, `Top of the Pops style. This show celebrates a gaggle of girls in performance at the BBC, from the Spice Girls to The Supremes, Labelle to TLC, and The Pointer Sisters to B.Witched.

programme.title: Girl Bands Forever
programme.desc: Its the 90s, and girl bands All Saints, Eternal and the Spice Girls battle to become chart toppers. As girl band mania goes global, who will come out on top and at what cost?

programme.title: Girl Bands Forever
programme.desc: In the new millennium, as the girl bands of the 90s split, new bands Atomic Kitten and Mis-Teeq vie for success. How will the next generation deal with life in the spotlight?

programme.title: Radio 2 in the Park
programme.desc: From Never Ever to Pure Shores, the 90s hitmakers are back and bigger than ever.

programme.title: Bananarama at the BBC
programme.desc: Bananarama are the girl group with more chart entries than any other in the world, and now they are getting the at the BBC treatment with this collection of performances from the BBC archives.

programme.title: One Fine Morning
programme.desc: A single mother raising an eight-year-old daughter struggles to take care of her father, whos been diagnosed with a neurodegenerative disease. While trying to secure a decent nursing home, she runs into a married friend and they begin an affair.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: For three police recruits in Belfast, the pressure is immense. Facing criminal gangs and divided communities, they dont know who to trust.

programme.sub-title: Halloween Bear; Clean Bear; Wandering Spirits; Mirror, Mirror on the Wall; Grizzy the Wizard; Moonwalk Bear; Polar Bear; Bear Spread; Cellular Bear
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. Grizzy wants to give the she-bear he is in love with a plastic ring that he finds really swell.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. Meanwhile, Joey is afraid to end his relationship with a diminutive woman who punches him hard every time she thinks something is fun.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: Warm-hearted tale about an all-American family who adopt a loveable puppy, little realising that the creature will grow into a 185-pound St Bernard. programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Featuring music from Emeli Sande, stand up comedy from rising star Joe Lycett, comedy material from Michael himself and Strictly hero Ed Balls plays Celebrity Send To All. And one unsuspecting member of the public will get the surprise of their life.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds a police officers badge and goes on a spree of arrests until she meets up with the owner, while Joey wonders if he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Inadvertent Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel has an interview for her dream job at Ralph Lauren. All goes well until she inadvertently kisses the interviewer, and at the second interview she mistakenly berates him for his `sexual intentions. Meanwhile, Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebes, and Joey is arrested for stalking a sexy neighbour with whom Ross gets a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachels new boss and colleague both smoke. When Rachel discovers that they make business decisions without her in the smoking room, she pretends to be a serious smoker so she can be part of the discussion. Meanwhile, Rosss son and Joey audition for the same commercial, but only one of them can get the part.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Cant Flirt
programme.desc: Ross really likes the pretty pizza-delivery woman, but his flirting technique is awful. Meanwhile, a nasty surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang travel to Las Vegas, Nevada, where more than one surprise awaits them. After Ross misinterprets Rachels actions, a war of public humiliation results.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: After considering retirement, Satan decides to hang on for another 10,000 years, angering his older sons and heirs. They decamp to New York and seal Hell shut, but without a regular supply of souls, Satan could literally evaporate into thin air. His only hope lies in his nerdy youngest son, but even with the help of Valerie and a talking dog, hes going to have problems persuading his bigger brothers to return to Hell.

The miniature bicycle was built by their grandfather to be displayed in the window of his bike shop, but the bike and his ability to ride it soon brought him fame, earning him a place in the Guiness Book of Records for his expertise.

programme.title: Massive Engineering Mistakes
programme.desc: A crane disastrously falls across two lanes of traffic during construction work on a landmark bridge in New York City.

programme.title: Destroyed in Seconds

programme.desc: Drew and Tee visit Newark, a town renowned for its antique connections. Drew finds a set of Regency bed steps and a genuine, very rare 18th-century mirror.

programme.desc: Celebrities hunt for a new home. Gaby Roslin helps interior designer to the stars, Kelly Hoppen, find a rural retreat in Oxfordshire for £3 million.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team perform house clearances and uncover hidden gems. What will these antiques sell for at auction?

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: In Knaresborough, Angus sorts through a massive collection of model aircrafts and incredible paintings. Later, Angus auctions off some iconic toys.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. They look for hidden gems to be auctioned off for profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Old friends become rivals as antique experts Phil Serrell and James Braxton hit the road in a 1955 Austin Healey. The experts start their journey in Glasgow and Phil heads off the mainland before the pair meet up again for their auction in Edinburgh.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: On the second leg of their road trip, Phil Serrell has some catching up to do. Can he claw back the deficit? Or will James Braxton pull further away as the pair cross the border from Scotland towards an auction in Kendal?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Phil Serrell and James Braxton travel through North West England on the third leg of their road trip. Phil visits the birthplace of the worlds most iconic band in Liverpool and James relives his childhood as he finds out the story of scouting.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Beginning in Kingsley, Cheshire, antiques experts Phil Serrell and James Braxton head towards an auction in Liverpool on the penultimate leg of their road trip.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts Phil Serrell and James Braxton begin the final leg of their road trip in Wales. With James closing the gap, its all to play for as the experts head for a final auction showdown in Newport, Shropshire.

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits Eastbournes the Sheldon, where owner Judith is doing nothing to make her business stand out from the competitive seaside crowd. With Judiths help, Alex gets busy rebranding the Sheldon as a family BandB in time for the summer.

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Life at this 11-bed country house may be idyllic, but the business is not. Retirees Val and Nick need to rebrand and rejuvenate, but Alex has a job convincing them of it before the reviewers arrive.

programme.title: Cornwall Air 999
programme.desc: The air ambulance airlifts a driver with nasty leg injuries and a woman whos been knocked unconscious after a fall. They also help a patient whos stopped breathing.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Silversmith Brenton repairs a broken garden statue. Steve is tasked with fixing a cherished but damaged 100-year-old clock.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident horologist Steve Fletcher and ceramics restorer Kirsten Ramsay turn their skills to fixing an art deco lamp in the shape of a lady, who is suffering from broken ankle after an unfortunate accident. Furniture restorer Will Kirk uncovers some hidden secrets while restoring a treasured wooden sea captains chest so it can be passed onto a fourth generation of the same family.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen pool their talents and resources to restore heirlooms and treasured antiques such as music boxes, vases and clocks to prove that anything can be restored to its former glory.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: An idyllic farm in Surrey turns eerie when dusk falls. The team discovers the land, once owned by former Prime Minister David Lloyd George, harbours dark secrets, including a brutal murder in the 1700s.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Carrie and Malcolm moved into his inherited Scottish family home five years ago, only to be plagued by unsettling paranormal activity. The team uncover two spirits with a sad connection and gather evidence that shocks a sceptical Malcolm.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected

programme.desc: Tony Bs boss, Mr Kim, offers to finance a massage parlour to be run by his daughter and Tony, however all does not go to plan when Tony feels Mr Kim is not pulling his weight. Elsewhere, AJ remains perilously close to failing English so Carmela visits Mr Wegler, who persuades her to go to dinner with him, and then to sleep with him.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: While attending the funeral of his Aunt Concetta, Tony visits his parents gravesite and finds Fran Felstein, Johnny Sopranos long-time mistress. Intrigued by Fran, Tony starts spending time with her. In a session with Dr Melfi, Tony reveals that when he was a teenager he once lied to his mother, who was hospitalised following a miscarriage, regarding his fathers whereabouts.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony does his best to steer clear of the New York turf struggle. Meanwhile, Little Carmines camp is clandestinely courting Tony Blundetto. On the home front, Carmela throws a 75th birthday barbecue for her father, Hugh. Tony is not initially invited to the party, but Hugh insists that he be there. Carmela relents, and Tony attends the party. Later that evening, Tony and Carmela find themselves alone.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Hans tomb is discovered, and Rick OConnell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Hans tomb is discovered, and Rick OConnell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck hound finds himself in a town full of cats who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villains evil plot. With help from a reluctant trainer, the underdog must assume the role of fearsome samurai and save the day.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: The insatiably curious Leonardo da Vinci leaves Italy to join the French court, where he can experiment freely, invent incredible machines and study the human body. He is joined on his adventure by the audacious French princess Marguerite de Nevarre.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: The entire town is watching with bated breath as one of their own is up for an Oscar. They get more than they bargain for when he outs his high-school English teacher, who then has to prove to everyone, especially his fiancee, that hes straight. The press turn up and one reporter in particular is making life very difficult.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker and a street hustler.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Marmee is the head of the March household in the absence of her husband, whos away fighting in the US Civil War. Her daughters range from the headstrong Jo and sweet Beth, to domesticated Meg and wilful Amy. The film follows the trials and tribulations of the girls, from early poverty and tragedy to Jos later efforts to secure both a husband and a successful writing career, and Amys relationship with an old family friend.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Job Hunting
programme.desc: Fancy a career change? This week, the Cinema List goes hunting for jobs with these film names as a guide. From `The Mechanic to `The Accountant, dust off your CV with these hardworking hits.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: Kimberly Wells is a TV news reporter, Richard Adams her cameraman. While shooting a routine piece at a nuclear power plant with manager Jack Godell, theres an emergency. A faulty gauge has resulted in cooling water being drained from the core. Seconds from disaster, Godell manages to avert `The China Syndome - in theory, the core melts, falls through the Earth and comes out in China.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Schindlers List

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A high school senior befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are sent to live with their uncle Count Olaf, but he only wants their family fortune. What follows is a battle of wits.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when Y2K becomes a reality.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Ramona becomes crippled by grief after the death of her husband, leaving her to care for her two children alone in her farmhouse. Her sadness soon turns to fear when a spectral woman in black appears on her front lawn, warning her "todays the day."

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Survivors of a global plague are besieged in Las Vegas. The Umbrella Corporation wants Alice for her DNA. If the scientists dont get her, the zombies will.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: New allies and old friends aid Alice in her worldwide search for those responsible for the T-virus outbreak that continues to turn humans into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: Following the death of a local diver, a New York palaeontologist is sent out to help the local fisheries warden investigate the case.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Survivors of a global plague are besieged in Las Vegas. The Umbrella Corporation wants Alice for her DNA. If the scientists dont get her, the zombies will.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: New allies and old friends aid Alice in her worldwide search for those responsible for the T-virus outbreak that continues to turn humans into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico become trapped in a shark cage on the ocean floor. As their oxygen starts to run out and with great white sharks circling them, the sisters must find a way to get to the surface alive.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.desc: A detective and a Secret Service agent investigate the abduction of a senators daughter from a school.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: A troubled police officer is recruited by the FBIs chief investigator to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorising Baltimore, Maryland.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A hit man falls for his bosss wife when he is asked to escort her on a date, a boxer reneges on his promise to throw a big fight, and a couple attempt a heist that rapidly escalates out of control.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.desc: Mr Stein, the long-absent senior partner of Wills firm, shows up unexpectedly to reassume command. He needs a bright, attentive lawyer to do some of his dirty work: enter Will. Meanwhile, Grace and Jack are shocked to discover that Karen is now poorer than a church mouse.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: The first sense to evolve in the first animals was chemoreception. It means being able to detect chemicals in the animals environment. This helps animals find prey and mates, and to sense predators from a distance.

programme.title: Animal Senses

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Seeing the world is one of the most amazing animal adaptations. Different types of eyes give animals different types of vision, and in some cases they can be extraordinary.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Sound waves are produced by movement. Animals have evolved organs to detect those sound waves in the air or water to perceive movements in their environment. This can be used to find prey, predators, and mates. These are some of the animals that have mastered the sense of hearing.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Some animals have senses that humans cant even conceive. With those powers they can do marvellous things.

programme.title: Animal Senses
